Class StateMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              prefuse.Display
                  StateMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class StateMenu
extends prefuse.Display

This class creates a Fisheye Menu visualisation of all the states. On clicking a state, a Fisheye menu of the political parties in the state is displayed. The list of MPs of a given political party from a state can be seen by clicking the name of the political party in the Fisheye menu. Control enters this class from the 'run' method, which mkes necessary function calls to create the visualisation.

See Also:
Serialized Form
